GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

APP_DATE.title: Date of Application
APP_DATE.instruction: Enter today's date in DD-MM-YYYY format.

CUST_TYPE.title: Customer Type
CUST_TYPE.instruction: Tick 'Resident' if you live in India. Tick 'Non-Resident' if you live abroad.

CUST_ID.title: Customer ID
CUST_ID.instruction: Enter your Customer ID (found in your chequebook or mobile banking app).

PRIMARY_ACC_NO.title: Primary Account Number
PRIMARY_ACC_NO.instruction: Enter your main bank account number. This is a mandatory field.
rejections: Account number does not match bank records

NAME_ON_CARD.title: Name to Print on Card
NAME_ON_CARD.instruction: Write the name exactly as you want it to appear on your debit card. Use letters onlyâ€”no special characters (like @, &, #) are allowed.

REASON_FOR_REQUEST.title: Reason for Request
REASON_FOR_REQUEST.instruction: Tick one box: 'New Issuance' for a fresh card, 'Lost/Stolen' if you lost your old one, or 'Damaged' if it is broken.

ENTITY_NAME.title: Entity Name (Business Only)
ENTITY_NAME.instruction: Fill this ONLY if the account belongs to a company or business. Write the business name to be printed on the card. Do not use special characters.

CARD_CATEGORY.title: Card Category (Domestic/International)
CARD_CATEGORY.instruction: Tick 'Domestic' for use within India only. Tick 'International' for global use. Note: NRO Account holders cannot choose International.

LINK_ACC_1.title: Link Additional Account 1
LINK_ACC_1.instruction: If you want to access another IDFC account with this same card, write that account number here.

LINK_ACC_2.title: Link Additional Account 2
LINK_ACC_2.instruction: Write a second additional account number to link, if applicable.

DE_LINK_ACC_1.title: De-Link Account 1
DE_LINK_ACC_1.instruction: If you want to REMOVE an account so this card can no longer access it, write that account number here.

CHANGE_PRIMARY_ACC.title: Change Primary Account
CHANGE_PRIMARY_ACC.instruction: If you want to switch your main account for this card, write the new Primary Account Number here.

EXISTING_CARD_NO.title: Existing Debit Card Number
EXISTING_CARD_NO.instruction: If you already have a card and are updating details or replacing it, write the old card number here.

SIGNATURE.title: Customer Signature
SIGNATURE.instruction: Sign here. The signature must match your bank records. Note: Joint accounts where 'both must sign' cannot get a debit card.
rejections: Account has 'Jointly' operation mode (Debit cards not issued)

BANK_USE_ONLY.title: For Bank Use Only
BANK_USE_ONLY.instruction: This section must be completed by bank officials only, including service request number, employee ID, branch details, and official signature.
